/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

/ActivityDefinition.summary: Manager for resources of type ActivityDefinition
/ActivityDefinition.description: The Manager for resources of type ActivityDefinition: provides services to manage the collection of all the ActivityDefinition instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type ActivityDefinition based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _source
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given source value (Resource.meta.source)

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Base of resource

parameters.name: baseEnvironment
parameters.description: Base Environment of resource

parameters.name: composed-of
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A use context assigned to the activity definition

parameters.name: context-quantity
parameters.description: A quantity- or range-valued use context assigned to the activity definition

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the activity definition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The activity definition publication date

parameters.name: depends-on
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the activity definition

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the activity definition is intended to be in use

parameters.name: ehealthPredecessor
parameters.description: Predecessor of resource

parameters.name: employeeTitle
parameters.description: Title intented for clinicians

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the activity definition

parameters.name: intendedAudience
parameters.description: The intended audience of the plan definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the activity definition

parameters.name: modifier_role_reference
parameters.description: Reference to either Organization, CareTeam, Practitioner

parameters.name: modifier_role_role
parameters.description: Role of Organization, CareTeam, Practitioner

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the activity definition

parameters.name: predecessor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the activity definition

parameters.name: recommendation
parameters.description: Recommendation for the plan definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the activity definition

parameters.name: successor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the activity definition

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topics associated with the module

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the activity definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the activity definition

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/ActivityDefinition/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type ActivityDefinition

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

/DocumentReference.summary: Manager for resources of type DocumentReference
/DocumentReference.description: The Manager for resources of type DocumentReference: provides services to manage the collection of all the DocumentReference instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type DocumentReference based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _filter
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a filter

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _source
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given source value (Resource.meta.source)

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: authenticator
parameters.description: Who/what authenticated the document

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Who and/or what authored the document

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Categorization of document

parameters.name: contenttype
parameters.description: Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

parameters.name: custodian
parameters.description: Organization which maintains the document

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: When this document reference was created

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Human-readable description

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Context of the document  content

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Main clinical acts documented

parameters.name: facility
parameters.description: Kind of facility where patient was seen

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format/content rules for the document

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Master Version Specific Identifier

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Human language of the content (BCP-47)

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Uri where the data can be found

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Who/what is the subject of the document

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Time of service that is being documented

parameters.name: related
parameters.description: Related identifiers or resources

parameters.name: relatesto
parameters.description: Target of the relationship

parameters.name: relation
parameters.description: replaces | transforms | signs | appends

parameters.name: relationship
parameters.description: Combination of relation and relatesTo

parameters.name: security-label
parameters.description: Document security-tags

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: current | superseded | entered-in-error

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Who/what is the subject of the document

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Kind of document (LOINC if possible)

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/_history.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of all types
/_history.description: Access a previous versions of all types

get.summary: Read the past states of all resources

parameters.name: _since
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were created at or after the given instant in time

parameters.name: _at
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were current at some point during the time period specified in the date time value (see Search notes on date searching)

parameters.name: _list
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that are referenced in the specified list (current list references are allowed)

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
